SMBus FIFO Status Register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x1c
Size:
0x4

Description

TX/RX FIFO levels and status flags

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:16] reserved r 0x0 Reserved
[15] rx_empty r - RX FIFO Empty
[14] rx_full r - RX FIFO Full
[13:8] rx_level r - RX FIFO Level
[7] tx_empty r - TX FIFO Empty
[6] tx_full r - TX FIFO Full
[5:0] tx_level r - TX FIFO Level

Field Descriptions

reserved - Reserved

Reserved bits

rx_empty - RX FIFO Empty

RX FIFO empty flag

rx_full - RX FIFO Full

RX FIFO full flag

rx_level - RX FIFO Level

Number of bytes in RX FIFO (0-32)

tx_empty - TX FIFO Empty

TX FIFO empty flag

tx_full - TX FIFO Full

TX FIFO full flag

tx_level - TX FIFO Level

Number of bytes in TX FIFO (0-32)
